scene_description_enriched: An angel with golden hair and pink wings, wearing a red tunic, descends from the sky, holding a scroll that reads "Gloria in excelsis Deo" (Glory to God in the highest). Below, three shepherds are depicted in a pastoral landscape. The shepherd on the left, in a red tunic and blue leggings, looks up at the angel with outstretched arms. The shepherd in the center, wearing a blue tunic and pink head covering, also looks upwards, while the third shepherd on the right, in a brown cloak, turns away. Several sheep are scattered around the shepherds. In the background, stylized buildings with blue roofs and towers are visible, suggesting a town or city.
